text:
You slip down through the rock like a ghost, feeling the solid surroundings only as a faint chill against your skin. It is rather like sinking through thick, cold tar.

At last Klef's spell brings you to the lower levels of the Battlepits. You emerge from a rough stone ceiling and drift gently down to solidify on a set of crude steps. An up-draught from below brings a stifling dank heat.
